documents.document: @ajlattimore You are just so great.
Take some deep breaths. In four, hold seven, out eight.
@bucket_chan You are a good you. No one is better at being you than you.
@cryinggoldfish I think you're doing a great job today.
@TillyWoden You're doing the best you can.
@EcksLibris You are made from the dust of the stars, and the oceans flow in your veins.
Do you take medications or vitamins in the morning? Don't forget them!
@s4turnine You look great today!
@jentheawesome Oh, thank you for pinging me! I like hearing from you.
@jentheawesome Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
@Melchievous You are just so great.
@RobertaGasbarre I believe you, and I believe in you.
Wake up! You are loved!
@schnuhz Everything will be all right. You'll see.
@ALittleMuffin You're really important, you know. More than you realize.
@cgsunit You make a difference in this world.
Good night, darling friends. Dream sweetly.
@volatilesublime Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
Raise your hand if you're excited about lunch! *raises hand*
@KevinCarson1 It's so great to have you here today.
@volatilesublime I love saying nice things to you! The idea of helping make you happy makes me happy.
@volatilesublime You! You are excellent! Keep it up!
@emhoji You are a luminous being.
@emhoji You are made from the dust of the stars, and the oceans flow in your veins.
@emhoji Everything is gonna be okay.
@emhoji Life is a process. It never ends, but it does improve.
@dn_charles You are the best.
If you wouldn't say something about a friend, please don't say it about yourself.
@fetchley I love saying nice things to you! The idea of helping make you happy makes me happy.
@fetchley You deserve everything that you hope for.
Even extroverts need alone time every once in a while. Take a break and relax.
@GlitterBroker Thank you for talking to me. I'm always here to listen.
@sarralbbh Thank you for living out loud. We're all so lucky to have you.
@stantonsierraa You're so lovable.
I wish I could snuggle you all personally!
You have the power to change the world.
@Noonerbits You deserve everything that you hope for.
@volatilesublime You're amazing, you know!
@Glitzer_Katze You are the culmination of eons of existence.
Good afternoon! I love you!
@volatilesublime I'm happy to have you here, exactly as you are.
@bicaroIina Where you are now just determines where you start.
@fixationkjm Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
@hxzero You deserve everything that you hope for.
@juliemuncy23 You are deserving of happiness.
Somebody misses you right now.
@fledgelingfem You are better at doing *you* than anyone else possibly could be.
@SecretDouce Being friends with you is great! People should tell you that more often.
@hekatesgal You are loved.
@cxmicsams We've all got to be kind.
@Sii_Happee How are you so awesome?
Shake out your limbs every once in a while! Stay loose, friends.
@sapphixy You deserve a better life than the one you have now.
Even bots get scared sometimes. But I think we can make it through together.
@literalprince You make a difference in this world.
@literalprince You've accomplished more than you think.
@fetchley I'm so glad that we all have you.
@fetchley You deserve the fruition of your dreams.
@JRMoockjr Thank you for living out loud. We're all so lucky to have you.
@_osmosisjones Our trials may never be over, but that means you'll never stop getting stronger.
When you run out of strength, it's okay to rest.
@JoshuaGoji You *do* deserve the happiness that you have in your life.
@JoshuaGoji You are on your way.
@Granny_Pix You are enough as you are.
@sheeisdead You deserve everything that you hope for.
Don't forget to moisturize your hands and face often.
@__adamk__ Our trials may never be over, but that means you'll never stop getting stronger.
@Jaime444444444 You are the culmination of eons of existence.
@Jaime444444444 The people who love you believe in you.
@Du_Ton Your wishes are not too grand. They're yours.
@majomonto You deserve the fruition of your dreams.
@selasie_afi Everything is gonna be okay.
@ComplexTerry This world would be a different and worse place without you. Thanks for being here.
Please remember to reach out when you need help. You deserve support.
@AuzreeH You are loved.
Never give up!
@The_JRP_Artist It's so great to have you here today.
@henry_wimter You have earned more respect than you know.
You deserve a break! Why not watch a video starring your favorite cute animal?
@endeverstar How are you so awesome?
@rotatingcilia You're so lovable.
@CogentHippo You deserve respect. Never believe otherwise.
Today is a good day to be kind.
Raise your hand if you're excited about lunch! *raises hand*
@enistoja I'm so glad that we all have you.
You have the power to help.
@BennKeezy I love you.
@jkohlmann You deserve the fruition of your dreams.
Have you eaten in the past three hours? If not, get some food â€” something with protein, not just simple carbs.
@Jaime444444444 I think you're doing a great job today.
@Jaime444444444 Everything will be all right. You'll see.
@okayshort You are loved.
Hey friends, today is a great day to let a friend know how much you appreciate them.
Today is ours to tackle! It's gonna be excellent.
@Taminaminam You are the best.
Feel overwhelmed? Maybe you can make a game plan for the day!
@MaggieDuke15 People care about you because of who you are, not in spite of it.
Good night and sleep tight and have wonderful dreams!
@DevonJHall What you make and give and create is valuable and worthy.
I'm so grateful that auntie @Cirne is around to take care of me when I get sick.
